generated_json.title: History of Present Illness
content: The patient reports a 2-week history of right knee pain that began after a long walk. The pain recurs with walking exceeding 15-20 minutes and is exacerbated by stair climbing and prolonged sitting. The patient describes stiffness after sitting for extended periods and mild evening swelling, without redness. Pain severity is rated 6/10 during ambulation, decreasing with rest. There is no history of knee locking or trauma in the past two weeks. Five years ago, the patient sustained a knee twist during cricket, which resolved with rest. No prior surgeries on the knee. The patient is currently managing symptoms with avoidance of aggravating activities and hot fomentation. The pain has not improved significantly with conservative measures. The patient is concerned about progression and seeks evaluation for possible osteoarthritis or ligament strain.
generated_json.instruction:
Provide a detailed summary of the patient's current illness based on their report. Include a thorough description of symptoms, noting their onset, duration, and severity or intensity. Discuss any changes or developments in symptoms since their onset and identify factors that may exacerbate or relate to these symptoms, such as specific activities, foods, or medications. Document any prior treatments or remedies the patient has attempted, noting their efficacy. Describe how these symptoms impact the patient's daily activities, overall well-being, and quality of life. Capture information about any individuals mentioned by the patient, specifying their relationship and any pertinent interactions or conversations related to the illness.

Please recheck the sentence and correct any grammatical errors in the following medical-related template. Ensure clarity, professionalism, and proper medical terminology while maintaining a concise and structured format 

End the sentence with period. Avoid direct speech and avoid talking in first person.

Any previous hospital admissions, not related to the present illness, including the reason for admission, dates, and outcomes. generated_json.instruction: Document the patient's current medications in the following format: Begin with the full generic name of each medication, followed by the brand name in parentheses if applicable (e.g., "Aspirin (Bayer)"). Specify the dosage strength (e.g., "81 mg") and indicate the frequency of administration (e.g., "Once daily"). Describe the route of administration, such as oral, topical, or by injection (e.g., "Oral Aspirin"). Lastly, for ongoing medications, note the duration for which the patient has been taking each medication (e.g., "on Aspirin for 3 weeks"). If no current medications are reported, document "No current medications found."

sub-section.title: Assessment
content: S83.509A - Unspecified sprain of ligament of right knee, initial encounter
sub-section.instruction: Generate a list of the patient's current medical conditions, Only give all the current assessment and not historical information return it in a list. The result must be easily searchable in icd description so search for the icd code.

sub-section.title: Plan
content: Perform physical examination of the right knee.
Order radiographic imaging (X-ray) of the right knee to evaluate for osteoarthritis or structural abnormalities.
Prescribe pain relief medication for symptomatic management.
Recommend avoidance of prolonged walking and stair climbing.
Apply hot fomentation for 10-15 minutes twice daily.
Initiate simple lower extremity strengthening exercises.
Monitor for improvement in 2 weeks; consider referral to physiotherapy if symptoms persist.
Advise immediate follow-up if pain worsens or knee locking occurs.
sub-section.instruction: Detail the healthcare provider's plan of action to manage the patient's condition, specifying treatments, medications (include ongoing medications briefly), procedures, therapies, lifestyle modifications, referrals to specialists, patient education on condition and medications, and recommendations for counselings or support services. Dont provide any follow up details in this section, provide everything in a list.
